name: Grand Town: Real Racing 2020
description:
In this game you can drive cool cars, ride a horse, and control the helicopter or motorboat. You can also swim in the sea, train, complete the different missions and get rewards. The game has a table of the best players. To become the best complete all missions and collect gems. Share your result with friends.

Key features:
- Easy control
- Fantastic graphics
- Specific cars
- Motorbike
- Motorcycle riding
- Motorboat driving
- Control of the third person
- Grand Street
- Grand City
- Beautiful town
- Fantastic car physics
- Fantastic people physics
- Beautiful beach
- Missions
- Helicopter physics
- Truck driving
- Swimming
- Car jumping
- Balloon
